Xbox Clips & Screenshots Gallery - A Next.js application for viewing and downloading Xbox media.

## Project Setup Complete

- [x] Next.js project scaffolded with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
- [x] Microsoft MSAL authentication configured
- [x] Xbox Live API integration implemented
- [x] Screenshots and clips gallery components created
- [x] All dependencies installed and project compiled successfully
- [x] Development server running at http://localhost:3000

## Next Steps

1. Create Azure AD app registration at https://portal.azure.com
2. Update `.env.local` with your Azure Client ID
3. Sign in with your Microsoft account to test the app
4. View your Xbox screenshots and clips!

See README.md for detailed setup instructions.
